data.name: Gambit
data.description: With a dash of Cajun charm, Gambit fights alongside the X-Men using his mutant ability to charge objects with kinetic energy, transforming them into deadly explosives.

starItems.name: Gambit
starItems.description: With a dash of Cajun charm, Gambit fights alongside the X-Men using his mutant ability to charge objects with kinetic energy, transforming them into deadly explosives.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>60%</color> damage.

Bonus Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Bonus Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to most injured enemy

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

Bonus Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to the most injured enemy

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

Bonus Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to most injured enemy

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.

Bonus Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Bonus Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to most injured enemy

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Bonus Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>60%</color> Piercing.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When this character is AI controlled, this attack will only be used if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When this character is AI controlled, this attack will only be used if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

When this character is AI controlled, this attack will only be used if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
3.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

When this character is AI controlled, this attack will only be used if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

When this character is AI controlled, this attack will only be used if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

When this character is AI controlled, this attack will only be used if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and adjacent targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.
If <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Ability Block</color> to the primary target, then lose <color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

Apply <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to self and all <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies.

When this character is AI controlled, this attack will only be used if this character has <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

1.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade: Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect into a negative effect on all enemies

2.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade: If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemies

4.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>260%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemies.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>390%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemies.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade: If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, always apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemies

6.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>390%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to all enemies.

Flip <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect to a negative effect on all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>130%</color> Piercing to all enemies
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects into negative effects

7.description:
Attack all enemies for <color=#86e619>520%</color> Piercing.
If this character has <color=#86e619>3</color> or more <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to all enemies.

Flip <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects to negative effects on all enemies.

This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

When this character or an ally Rogue drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time:
> Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to that character.
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

On Crit, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
1.nextUpgrade:
At the end of any enemy turn, attack the most injured non-summoned enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health

2.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any enemy turn:
 > Attack the most injured non-summoned enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

When this character or an ally Rogue drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time:
> Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to that character.
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

On Crit, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
2.nextUpgrade: While this character has <color=#fff568>Evade</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> and <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies

3.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any enemy turn:
 > Attack the most injured non-summoned enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>90%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

When this character or an ally Rogue drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time:
> Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to that character.
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

On Crit, gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Evade</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> and <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>90%</color> damage to the most injured non-summoned enemy
On Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> and <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health

4.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.

At the end of any enemy turn:
 > Attack the most injured non-summoned enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

When this character or an ally Rogue drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time:
> Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> to that character.
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.

On Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> and <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Evade</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> and <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
4.nextUpgrade:
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> and <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, at the end of any enemy turn, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for this character
Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health
<color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health
Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

5.description:
On Spawn, gain <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
At the end of any enemy turn:
 > Attack the most injured non-summoned enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>180%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> and <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color> for this character.

When this character or an ally Rogue drops below <color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health for the first time:
> Apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns + <color=#fff568>Immunity</color> for <color=#86e619>1</color> turn on that character.
> Clear all <color=#fff568>Defense Down</color> on that character.

While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Drain.
On Crit, apply <color=#fff568>Evade</color> to self, all <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> and <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies.
While this character has <color=#fff568>Evade</color>:
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage.
 > <color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> and <color=#fff568>X-TREME X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Chance and +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Crit Damage.

Gain +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>X-MEN</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
<color=#fff568>UNLIMITED X-MEN</color> allies gain an additional +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Max Health.
